did.abstract: The collection contains autograph albums, graduation programs, a class photograph, and one yearbook relating to the respective graduations in the 1920s to 1960s from various Brooklyn schools of Alan Nisselson, Harry Nisselson, and Anna Nisselson.

bioghist.head: Biographical note
bioghist.p: Alan Nisselson is the son of Harry Nisselson and Anna Lilienfeld and a resident of Brooklyn, New York. He graduated from PS 238 in 1960 and Brooklyn Technical High School in 1964. He received his BA from American University in 1968, a JD from Brooklyn Law School in 1976, and an MBA from New York University.

Nisselson practiced law as an associate at a creditors' rights law firm, as Assistant United States Attorney in the civil division of the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, and as head of the Creditors' Rights and Bankruptcy Department at Brauner Baron Rosenzweig & Klein, LLP.

As of 2016, Nisselson practices law as a partner at the firm of Windels Marx Lane & Mittendorf LLP. He is also on the panel of Chapter 7 trustees for the United States Bankruptcy Courts for the Southern and Eastern Districts of New York and the panel of mediators for the United States Bankruptcy Courts for the Southern and Eastern Districts of New York.
As of 2016, Nisselson is also a member of the board of trustees of Brookyln Historical Society.
